title: Aphrodite's Child - Discography (1968-2002) [mp3@192-320]
description:
Aphrodite's Child was a Greek progressive rock band formed in 1967, by Vangelis Papathanassiou (keyboards); Demis Roussos (bass guitar and vocals), Loukas Sideras (drums and vocals), and Anargyros "Silver" Koulouris (guitar). Papathanassiou and Roussos had already been successful in Greece (playing in the bands Formynx and Idols respectively) while they got together with Sideras and Koulouris to form a new band. Their first recording as a band was for George Romanos album In concert and in Studio where they played on four songs and were credited as "Vangelis and his orchestra". In the same year they recorded a two song demo and submitted it to Philips Records. <a href="
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aphrodite%27s_Child" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aphrodite%27s_Child</a>

Torrent includes:
1968 - End of the world
1969 - It's Five O'Clock
1971 - 666
1972 - Rain And Tears The Story Of
1975 - Best Of Aphrodite's Child
1995 - The Singles
2002 - Babylon The Great - An Introduction To Aphrodite's Child


Members
Demis Roussos - Vocals, Bass
Lucas Sideras - Drums, Vocals
Vangelis Papathanassiou - Keyboards
Anargyros "Silver" Koulouris (1967; 1970-1972) - Guitar
